metadata.description:
Proposed censorship plan for the Philippine Commonwealth Government distributed by Major Stanley Lambert, Commanding Officer of the First Censorship Area Detachment, Headquarters Sixth Army

"The object of Censorship in the Philippines will be to collect, evaluate, and disseminate information of an intelligence nature and to suppress and prevent the passage of information that will give aid or comfort to the enemy."
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; official papers; Military
metadata.title: Censorship Plan - Philippine Commonwealth Government
